channel.title: Auto-Donation System Problem
channel.description:
Source: Delta
I followed this tutorial: http://www.rune-server.org/runescape-development/rs2-server/tutorials/323057-martins-auto-donation-system.html
And I got rid of the errors I got in my compiler but when I run my server in the cmd this pops up:
java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: com.mysql.jdbc.Driver at java.net.URLClassLoader$1.run(Unknown Source) at java.net.URLClassLoader$1.run(Unknown Source) at java.security.AccessController.doPrivileged(Native Method) at java.net.URLClassLoader.findClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at sun.misc.Launcher$AppClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.Class.forName0(Native Method) at java.lang.Class.forName(Unknown Source) at MadTurnipConnection.createConnection(MadTurnipConnection.java:11) at MadTurnipConnection.run(MadTurnipConnection.java:29)
Does anyone have an idea on how to fix this?
Thanks alot :D

item.title: Auto-Donation System Problem
item.dc:creator: @Dan0194 Dan0194
item.description:
@Dan0194 wrote:

Source: Delta

I followed this tutorial: http://www.rune-server.org/runescape-development/rs2-server/tutorials/323057-martins-auto-donation-system.html

And I got rid of the errors I got in my compiler but when I run my server in the cmd this pops up:

java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: com.mysql.jdbc.Driver
at java.net.URLClassLoader$1.run(Unknown Source)
at java.net.URLClassLoader$1.run(Unknown Source)
at java.security.AccessController.doPrivileged(Native Method)
at java.net.URLClassLoader.findClass(Unknown Source)
at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source)
at sun.misc.Launcher$AppClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source)
at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source)
at java.lang.Class.forName0(Native Method)
at java.lang.Class.forName(Unknown Source)
at MadTurnipConnection.createConnection(MadTurnipConnection.java:11)
at MadTurnipConnection.run(MadTurnipConnection.java:29)

Does anyone have an idea on how to fix this?

Thanks alot

Read full topic
